posts.post_title: Sold - Wilhelm with Bat Old Mill - SGC 4
posts.post_content: $OLD - Kaiser Wilhelm w/ Bat, Old Mill - SGC 4.  $270 venmo no fee or $280 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested, thanks for looking.  NC residents add 6.5% ST.
